mapper.insert: INSERT INTO experience_wishlist( customer_id, experience_id, create_Date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{customerId}, #{experienceId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT e.experience_name, e.experience_content, e.experience_price, e.experience_startdate, e.experience_enddate, e.experience_person, ew.create_date, ew.update_date FROM experience_wishlist ew inner join experience e ON ew.experience_id = e.experience_id where customer_id NOT IN (SELECT customer_id FROM experience_wishlist) = #{customerId} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{ROW_PER_PAGE}
